questions.question: My mother ………………… in an insurance company.
questions.description: The simple present is used to talk about facts.

questions.question: I usually …………………. up at 6 but today I …………………. up at
questions.description: The simple present is used to talk about routines. The simple past is used to say that something happened at a certain point of time in the past.

questions.question: Turn on the lights. Change into passive.
questions.description: We use let to turn imperatives into passive voice.
answers: Let the lights be turned on

questions.question: I …………………. him for a long time.
questions.description: The present perfect is used with the meaning up to now.

questions.question: Abraham Lincoln abolished slavery. Replace abolish with a phrasal verb/idiomatic expression.
questions.description: To put an end to something is to abolish it.
